message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.AI 

The paper discusses security and resilience in the context of the Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT), which is a subfield of computer networks and security (cs.NI and cs.CR). The paper also proposes a framework for quantifying cyber-security risks and optimizing IIoT design, which involves software engineering and system design (cs.SE) and control systems (cs.SY). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of machine learning techniques for detecting cyber-attacks, which falls under the subfield of artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
